Package it.polimi.se2018.utils

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    Observer<T>
    An Observer<T> is an object that observes one or more Observable objects.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    ClaParser
    This class is a command line arguments parser.
    ClaParserTest  
    ClientConfiguration
    The class that contains the information to configure the client.
    ClientConfigurationTest
    Tests for ClientConfiguration.
    Coordinates
    Class that encapsulates the pair of coordinates to refer to a Cell on a Pattern
    DieUtils  
    GameUtils
    Utility class to create Game instances at different stages.
    GridUtils
    Simple utility class to provide unit tests some methods to manipulate grids.
    Logger  
    MockView
    The class is a 'false' view that makes the abstract view concrete and implements all abstract methods, in a way that the concrete method doesn't do something relevant but allows to see whether the method that had to be called was actually called.
    Observable<T>
    Abstract class for observable objects.
    PublicObjectiveFactory
    The class is a factory that instantiates a given number of PublicObjectiveCards.
    ResourceManager
    This class is used to retrieve information from application resources.
    ResourceManagerTest
    Unit tests for ResourceManager.
    SaxClientConfigurationParser
    The sax parser for the file that contains the information to create the ClientConfiguration.
    SaxServerConfigurationParser
    The sax parser for the file that contains the information to create the ServerConfiguration.
    ServerConfiguration
    The class that contains the information to configure the server.
    ServerConfigurationTest
    Tests for ServerConfiguration.
    XmlClientConfigLoader
    The class to create a ClientConfiguration, from the information contained in a file.
    XmlClientConfigLoaderTest
    Unit tests for the class XmlClientConfigLoader.
    XmlLoader
    The abstract class that contains the common methods for the classes that load xml files.
    XmlServerConfigLoader
    The class to create a ServerConfiguration, from the information contained in a file.
    XmlServerConfigLoaderTest
    Unit tests for the class XmlServerConfigLoader.
  • Exception Summary 
    Exception Description
    MissingConfigurationException
    The exception thrown when some method tries to get the reference to the instance of a ClientConfiguration or ServerConfiguration, but the class wasn't instantiated.
